name: RESOLVING_COMPONENT_WAIT_TIME
rawdescription:
Time the hook waits until it emits an undefined value.
Used for not defined widgets -> by default after 5s we
show an error that the widget could not be loaded.
description: Time the hook waits until it emits an undefined value. Used for not defined widgets -> by default after 5s we show an error that the widget could not be loaded.
